last_episode_to_air.name: Accentuate the Positive
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's1945 and VE Day celebrations are in full swing. Future Prime Minister Clement Attlee is in town to join in with the festivities. Gary finds himself rushing to Attlee's aid when disaster strikes.

name: Goodnight Sweetheart
overview: Gary Sparrow is an ordinary bloke in 1990s Britain, married to the ambitious Yvonne and working as a TV repairman. Then his whole world changes when he stumbles upon a portal to WWII-era London and begins a dual life as an accidental time traveler.

episodes.name: Rites of Passage
episodes.overview: Gary Sparrow is an unhappily married TV repairman, who one day unwittingly walks into a time warp. Totally disorientated, he thinks he's in a 1940s theme pub, until he falls in love with the landlord's daughter.

episodes.name: Fools Rush In
episodes.overview: Gary, after refusing to buy a new suit for a job interview in 1993, buys one to take Phoebe to a dance in 1940.

episodes.name: Is Your Journey Really Necessary?
episodes.overview: Gary returns to 1940 to try to protect Phoebe and Eric from an impending air raid, but nearly ends up in prison.

episodes.name: The More I See You
episodes.overview: Ron agrees to print identity papers for Gary's trips to 1940 - but at a price. Phoebe worries about her future living arrangements now that she's intent on leaving the pub.

episodes.name: I Get Along Without You Very Well
episodes.overview: Yvonne gets to spend more time with Gary due to him giving up his 1940s obsession, but he is quickly propelled back into things upon discovering that he may be married to Phoebe.

episodes.name: In the Mood
episodes.overview: Yvonne gives Gary an ultimatum about his wartime obsession, as he decides whether to return to 1940, or back home to 1995. Ron makes him an offer that he can't refuse.

episodes.name: Don't Get Around Much Anymore
episodes.overview: Gary invests money in an electronics company back in 1941, but his investment and business plans quickly collapses, and ultimately backfires.

episodes.name: I Got It Bad and That Ain't Good
episodes.overview: Yvonne has her heart set on moving house, while Gary feels more inclined to move between eras. Meanwhile, in 1941, a tall dark stranger seems to have entered Phoebe's life.

episodes.name: Just One More Chance
episodes.overview: Gary is due to appear in court after a drinking spree in 1941. He looks destined to lose his licence, his job and could well lose his wife, but she has marriage guidance in mind.

episodes.name: Who's Taking You Home Tonight
episodes.overview: Gary's fictional job working for Ron may cover his trips back in time to 1941, but it's not much help when both Yvonne and Phoebe expect him for dinner on the same evening.

episodes.name: Wish Me Luck
episodes.overview: Yvonne is in line for a work promotion, while Gary needs to decide which life to choose. Life in 1941 is appearing increasingly more attractive.

episodes.name: As You Wave Me Goodbye
episodes.overview: Gary discovers that living in 1941 isn't quite what he expected, but having 'committed suicide' in 1994, he can hardly return home. Or can he?

episodes.name: Would You Like to Swing on a Star?
episodes.overview: Gary's fictitious job with Ron may provide an alibi for his trips to 1941, but it doesn't pay the rent. The 1994 vintage record market may provide the solution.

episodes.name: Nice Work If You Can Get It
episodes.overview: Gary's new career as an entertainer in 1941 is taking off, as is his trade in rare wartime records and amateur dramatics in 1993, but the stress of such ventures is taking a toll.

episodes.name: Let Yourself Go
episodes.overview: Yvonne suspects that she's pregnant, while Gary accompanies Phoebe to the countryside. As Gary struggles to maintain his double life, an American airman enters the scene.

episodes.name: Don't Fence Me In
episodes.overview: Gary has chosen to lead a double life indefinitely, but his plans are threatened when builders start demolishing his route and portal back to 1941.

episodes.name: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
episodes.overview: Gary's route to 1941 has been blocked by a row of shops built in 1995. How will he reach Phoebe in her wartime pub?

episodes.name: It Ain't Necessarily So
episodes.overview: As New Year's Eve rapidly approaches, Gary seeks a way of celebrating the occasion with both his wife and girlfriend, in the contrasting timeframes of 1941 and 1995.

episodes.name: One O'Clock Jump
episodes.overview: Gary tries to rectify matters when his shop's success makes Yvonne depressed at her lack of employment prospects. Plus, he discovers that PC Deadman is unaware that he has a child.

episodes.name: It's a Sin to Tell a Lie
episodes.overview: Counterfeit money has been in circulation around Royal Oak, which Gary suspects may be attributed to Ron's attempts to sabotage his name.

episodes.name: Change Partners
episodes.overview: Time travelling comedy series starring Nicholas Lyndhurst. Gary is on top of the world, but pride comes before a fall, or in Gary's case, several falls.

episodes.name: Goodnight Children Everywhere
episodes.overview: An evicted Ron is now staying with Gary and Yvonne, and Phoebe's orphaned relatives arrive to move in with her at the Royal Oak.

episodes.name: Turned Out Nice Again
episodes.overview: George Formby turns up at the Royal Oak wanting to record a Beatles song that Gary claims to have written. Consequently, Gary has to find a way of keeping musical history intact.

episodes.name: There's Something About a Soldier
episodes.overview: Yvonne wants Gary to get a sensible job with her new company. Plus, Gary's wartime life seems threatened by a returning hero. Is it time for Gary to make a break from the past?

episodes.name: Someone to Watch Over Me
episodes.overview: Phoebe is very ill back in the 1940s, so Gary thinks that he may have a solution - but can he really take medicine back in time?

episodes.name: The Yanks Are Coming
episodes.overview: Gary is put out when the Americans arrive at the Royal Oak, but when there is an outbreak of racial tension Gary takes drastic action.

episodes.name: Let's Get Away from It All
episodes.overview: Yvonne and Phoebe both want to move home, but it isn't long before moving is the least of Gary's worries.

episodes.name: You're Driving Me Crazy
episodes.overview: The pressure is definitely mounting for Gary now that both Yvonne and Phoebe are pregnant. Yvonne is trying to get him a job in her firm so that she can give up work after the birth. Meanwhile, in 1942 Gary is accused of being a fence.

episodes.name: In the Mood
episodes.overview: Both Yvonne and Phoebe are pregnant and feeling unwell. Yet Yvonne and Gary agree to babysit Gary's nephew, Arthur, who goes missing during his visit and is suspected of having time travelled to 1942. So Gary might not be the only one that can access the time portal after all.

episodes.name: Out of Town
episodes.overview: Yvonne is out of town so Gary hopes to spend some time with Phoebe, but Gary's father George turns up and stuns him when telling a story about discovering a time warp in his youth.

episodes.name: And Mother Came Too
episodes.overview: Ron is in trouble with the police, while Phoebe tells Gary that they are finally free to marry.

episodes.name: The Leaving of Liverpool
episodes.overview: Gary and Phoebe visit wartime Liverpool, where Gary meets his hero grandfather, Albert. However things become very complicated when Gary is forced to play hero.

episodes.name: How Long Has This Been Going On?
episodes.overview: Yvonne has a miscarriage and Reg's mistress leaves her husband, who mistakes Gary for Reg.

episodes.name: Easy Living
episodes.overview: Yvonne leaves her job and Gary struggles to revisit 1942, where Phoebe is wedding planning.

episodes.name: Come Fly with Me
episodes.overview: Gary and Phoebe's wedding is drawing near, but will Gary's stamina hold out for two stag nights, 54 years apart?

episodes.name: Heartaches
episodes.overview: Gary oversleeps and misses his 1942 wedding. While In the present, Yvonne is upset that he's forgotten their first anniversary. Back in 1942, Gary appeases Phoebe and the wedding goes ahead.

episodes.name: Careless Talk
episodes.overview: With a wife on both sides of the time warp, Gary is rapidly running out of money and Ron has lost the will to print.

episodes.name: The Bells Are Ringing
episodes.overview: Yvonne's new health drink is about to go into production, but Gary is primarily concerned with Phoebe, who is going through childbirth back in the 1940s.

episodes.name: A Room with a View
episodes.overview: Gary and his son Michael are blasted into present time by a 1944 air raid bomb. They are caught by Yvonne, who demands an explanation regarding the child's identity.

episodes.name: London Pride
episodes.overview: In the present and wartime 1944, both Gary and Phoebe find themselves being refused entry into higher society circles.

episodes.name: When Two Worlds Collide
episodes.overview: The detonation of an unexploded bomb in Duckett's Passage catapults Gary into the present, with Phoebe in tow. Consequently Phoebe and Yvonne meet for the first time.

episodes.name: Mairzy Doats
episodes.overview: Gary tries to persuade Ron to give up his time travelling ambitions, and Yvonne begins some consultancy work for Chelsea FC, which Gary is pleased to hear, especially when she acquires some match tickets.

episodes.name: Pennies from Heaven
episodes.overview: Gary tries using his knowledge of the past to bet on certainties at the 1940s race track, but it all goes wrong. Meanwhile Ron's white fiver printing press is raided by the police.

episodes.name: We Don't Want to Lose You ... (1)
episodes.overview: Gary's assumed identity as a secret agent even fools the 1944 authorities. He is recruited by a genuine M15 agent to go on a secret mission to the Isle of Wight.

episodes.name: ... But We Think You Have to Go (2)
episodes.overview: Gary's secret mission in wartime France quickly descends into a dicey fight or flight situation, as the German's rapidly close in on him.

episodes.name: Have You Ever Seen a Dream Walking ...
episodes.overview: As the strain of living a double life takes its toll on Gary, Rolf Harris appears in a dream and berates him for having claimed the authorship of 'Two Little Boys.'

episodes.name: Love the One You're With
episodes.overview: The porter of Gary's Mayfair flats informs him that a former resident died in a road accident 55 years ago. Gary aims to travel back in time to reverse the chain of events.

episodes.name: My Heart Belongs to Daddy
episodes.overview: Gary encounters his 1940s now-adult son Michael, who is shabbily dressed and trying to flog him items. Gary returns to the past to try and improve Michael's future prospects.

episodes.name: Mine's a Double
episodes.overview: Whilst advancing through the time warp a severe storm in 1944 causes Gary to split into two opposing clones: a normal Gary and a bad version. Phoebe likes the former, while Yvonne prefers latter.

episodes.name: All About Yvonne
episodes.overview: Gary and Yvonne have a bust up which ends with Gary having to move out and into Ron's place. During Gary's estrangement he becomes suspicious of Yvonne's interior designer. Meanwhile over in 1944, Phoebe suspects that Gary is having an affair with Yvonne, and Reg contracts impetigo.

episodes.name: California Dreamin'
episodes.overview: Gary has to think fast when both of his wives decide they want to emigrate to California. In 1944 Reg retires from his job, but no one turns up at his leaving do.

episodes.name: Grief Encounter
episodes.overview: Gary and Phoebe are cast in Noel's film Brief Encounter, but Gary declines. Meanwhile, both Phoebe and Yvonne catch the attentions of other men, which Gary resents and intercepts.

episodes.name: The 'Ouses in Between
episodes.overview: A foggy night in London leads Gary into the unknown time territory of 1880. Here Gary comes face to face with the notorious Jack the Ripper, who manages to access the time portal.

episodes.name: Just in Time
episodes.overview: When a workman arrives to carryout repairs in the time portal alleyway, Gary begins to contemplate where his future lies.

episodes.name: How I Won the War
episodes.overview: Gary thinks that Yvonne is having an affair, so he asks Ron to spy on her for him. Plus, Gary and Phoebe join a concert troupe in Belgium, but their efforts are quickly thwarted.

episodes.name: Something Fishie
episodes.overview: Gary and Phoebe come up against the bully tactics of a protection racket, so Gary utilises his modern gadgets to halt their reign of terror. Plus, Yvonne receives a rude surprise.

episodes.name: Flash Bang Wallop
episodes.overview: Gary must ensure that a compromising photo taken of him in the 1940s avoids discovery in the present. Yvonne goes to see Noel Coward's Gary and Phoebe stage play.

episodes.name: Accentuate the Positive
episodes.overview: It's1945 and VE Day celebrations are in full swing. Future Prime Minister Clement Attlee is in town to join in with the festivities. Gary finds himself rushing to Attlee's aid when disaster strikes.
